F2.AppManifest Class

The assets needed to render an app on the page

Defined in: sdk\src\classes.js:183
  • Summary
  • Properties

Properties

Name Description
apps

The array of F2.AppManifest.AppContent objects
inlineScripts

Any inline javascript tha should initially be run
scripts

Urls to javascript files required by the app
styles

Urls to CSS files required by the app

F2

An open & free framework created for building financial applications.

Enabling smarter financial applications

F2 is governed by its Advisory Board, and maintained by Markit On Demand on GitHub. F2 is licensed under the Apache 2.0 License.
